div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: The 2020-2021 regular open enrollment application period is February 3, 2020 - April 30, 2020 at 4:00 p.m. The alternative open enrollment application for the 2019-20...
In this interlude between what was a normal school year and whenever we happen to be together again, I want to make sure everyone has the information they need to keep...

img.alt: 2019/20 Change in Positions and New Hires Newsletter

a.span: 2019/20 Change in Positions and New Hires Newsletter

div.p: 2019/20 Change in Positions and New Hires Newsletter

p.span: Reminder tomorrow is pick up and drop off day at the Elementary School between 10:00-12:00pm 4K, K, 1 - Front Loop 2,3,4 - Back Parking Lot Loop Have a sign with child’s name, grade and teacher. Bring any library books and finished work!

**Bring library books, completed work folders or any other items you'd like dropped off to the Elementary School on Friday that you are done with - we will collect it! If you don't have anything to return that's okay too. We will have another drop off day late May.

Elementary Student Material Pick Up/Drop Off: Friday, April 24th anytime between 10:am-12:00pm. 4K (including Trinity), K, 1 - Front Loop. 2nd, 3rd, 4th - Back Parking Lot. Please stay in your car - have a sign with child name, grade, homeroom teacher - open trunk/backend.

SCC Parents, Students and Staff: Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for you flexibility, resiliency and care. Our incredible SCC community culture and everything we stand for has really been showcased through these unique times. You are amazing!

Expanded Version: St. Croix Central HS Tribute to Our Students (added content).
https://youtu.be/NOFWHreO6MM
Thank you, Mr. Jourdeans!

div.p:
St. Croix Central
915 Davis Street
Hammond, WI 54015
Phone: 715-796-4500
Fax: 715-796-4510
Copyright © St. Croix Central School District 2020. All rights reserved.

Governor Evers' "Safer At Home" Emergency Order #28 states all public schools are closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year except for facilitating distance or virtual learning. The free meal preparation and delivery program will continue through this period as it is deemed an essential service.

We know this closure brings many questions from our parents, students, and staff. As this fluid and dynamic situation evolves, we will continue to update our website, Facebook and Twitter pages as we receive additional information and guidance from the Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction (DPI), the Wisconsin Department of Health Services (DHS) and the Centers for Disease Control (CDC).
We are in this together and will continue to put the safety and well-being of our SCC family at the forefront of our decisions.
Please click this link to read our Frequently Asked Questions document. We will update the FAQ document as we receive new information and guidance.
You may find additional information on our COVID-19 page.
